Biking Activities

Here, you’ll find updates on Murat’s outdoor road bike activities.

Nice afternoon biking exercise ends. pic.twitter.com/DQWWK5PEQF

— Murat Kahveci (@iMuratKahveci) September 26, 2020

Ended up with a 74.47 km in 3 hr 6 min ride in a beautiful sunny day. I was having flat tire issues last month. It seems all are resolved by replacing the rim strips. Also, I replaced the tires to 700cx25 for more pro-like experience.
